philosophy.title: Discipline Creates Freedom
philosophy.description1: We are not a gym. We are a training space for those who understand that martial arts is a practice, not a performance.
philosophy.description2: Fighters, executives, expats, students. Different lives, same mat. Respect the space. Respect each other.

whyDifferent.subtitle: Our Approach
whyDifferent.title: Why Striker's House is Different
whyDifferent.description1: Here, competition and personal growth share the same floor.
whyDifferent.description1b: Others come to become stronger — physically and mentally.
whyDifferent.description2: We don't separate people by ego, age or background.
whyDifferent.description2a: We bring them together through structure, respect and consistency.
whyDifferent.closing: Because real strength is built over time.

team.becomeTitle: How to Become a Striker's House Athlete
team.becomeDescription: Becoming a student athlete means committing to a higher level of training while balancing your studies or career. It's not about being the best — it's about being ready to grow through competition.

step1.title: Train Consistently
step1.description: Start as a regular member. Show dedication, discipline, and a genuine love for the sport.

step2.title: Coach Evaluation
step2.description: Our coaches identify potential athletes based on skill, attitude, and commitment to growth.

step3.title: Competition Track
step3.description: Join our competition preparation classes. Intensified training with sparring and conditioning.

step4.title: Represent the Team
step4.description: Compete under the Striker's House flag with full coach support and team backing.

requirements.req1: Minimum 6 months of consistent training at Striker's House
requirements.req2: Demonstrated technical proficiency and understanding of fundamentals
requirements.req3: Strong work ethic and positive attitude towards training partners
requirements.req4: Ability to balance competition preparation with work or studies
requirements.req5: Commitment to representing the team values inside and outside the gym

team.ctaTitle: Ready to Take the Next Step?
team.ctaDescription: If you feel you have what it takes to compete, speak with your coach about joining the athlete program. Every champion started with a single decision.
